overview: Perhaps one of the most persecuted of God's Generals, A. A. Allen operated his healing ministry with a heart for God's people. Watch live footage of Allen healing a man in a stretcher, causing a leg to grow, and ridding a man of tumors. Find out why a man who paid an incredible price for spiritual strength and divine gifting fought an ultimately losing battle for his own body's healing.
title: God's Generals: Vol. 10: A.A. Allen
